summary: This mod adds an armor rating similar to that of Steel Armor to the Amulet of Articulation.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod on the Nexus, and it's a pretty simple one.

Armored Articulation makes the armor rating of the Amulet of Articulation (the only armored piece of clothing in the game) much higher,
which allows for you to have normal clothing or light armor equipped on your character for whatever reasons you like (role-playing, better
character aesthetics, etc.), while still being able to partake in combat fairly normally. All versions of the amulet should have an armor rating
of 45. Enjoy the mod!

-NasMaster
author: NasMaster
